Sativa vs. Indica: Physical Appearance. While both of these plants have green leaves for the most part, Indica is a bit darker than sativa. Indica also has broader and fuller leaves. Indica plants usually grow short and wide, between 2-4 feet tall, making it better and easier for indoor growing.
